org.hkijena.jipipe.api.data.storage

Interface JIPipeWriteDataStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, JIPipeDataStorage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JIPipeFileSystemWriteDataStorage

    public interface JIPipeWriteDataStorage
extends JIPipeDataStorage
    JIPipeDataStorage that is used for writing a JIPipeData.

    • Method Summary

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the file stream
